node.title: Alok Vaid-Menon Finds Beauty Beyond Gender
node.alt: “Beauty, for me, is what the natural orientation of the universe is returning to,” said Alok Vaid-Menon.
node.description: The fluid artist moves seamlessly among poetry, comedy, fashion and writing.
node.content: ["Name: Alok Vaid-Menon", "Age: 30", "Hometown: College Station, Texas", "Now Lives: In a sunny, two-bedroom apartment with ample closet space in uptown Manhattan with a roommate.", "Claim to Fame: Mx. Vaid-Menon is a gender nonconforming artist, writer and comedian who uses their work to redefine beauty standards, examine colonialism and explore fluid identity. \u201cThe word \u2018artist\u2019 is one of possibility, not constriction,\u201d they said. \u201cSo it means that I\u2019m kind of ambivalent about form and I\u2019m more invested in flow.\u201d Mx. Vaid-Menon explores ideas through poetry and nonfiction, but also through fashion, virtual book clubs and live performances.", "Big Break: This summer, Mx. Vaid-Menon appeared on \u201cMan Enough,\u201d a podcast that explores what masculinity is; previous guests have included Shawn Mendes and Matthew McConaughey. In one memorable moment, Mx. Vaid-Menon asked the cisgender hosts, including Justin Baldoni and Jamey Heath, to consider if they were \u201cready to heal.\u201d \u201cThat\u2019s the thing that people are saying to me when they recognize me on the street now \u2014 \u2018I loved your podcast interview,\u2019\u201d they said. \u201cIt\u2019s just so surreal to me because it\u2019s kind of the things I\u2019ve been saying and doing for over a decade.\u201d", "Latest Project: Mx. Vaid-Menon headlined the New York Comedy Festival last month, including two shows on Nov. 13. \u201cWhen you spend your entire life being on one side of the joke, it\u2019s actually quite therapeutic to be able to make a joke,\u201d Mx. Vaid-Menon said. \u201cSome of my favorite comedians are Black, Indigenous, people of color and trans people because we know that humor is not about levity. In a world that\u2019s committed to making your life miserable, there\u2019s something audacious and beautiful about insisting on maintaining your humor and your delight.\u201d", "Next Thing: This month, Mx. Vaid-Menon is self-publishing a poetry book called \u201cYour Wound/My Garden.\u201d \u201cAt the beginning of my career I was really concerned with detailing the nature of the wound that I had in the world,\u201d Mx. Vaid-Menon said. \u201cI was paying so much attention to the ways in which I was discriminated against that I forgot to pay attention to the ways in which I was already free.", "Eyes on the Prize: Fashion plays an important role in Mx. Vaid-Menon\u2019s presentation, often blending traditionally feminine shapes, such as bras and skirts, with clothing that defies gender categories. The same applies to their hair style. \u201cBeauty, for me, is what the natural orientation of the universe is returning to,\u201d Mx. Vaid-Menon said."]
